creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
The 'dir' command is supposed to change the ant working dir to "mydir".  It does not work.  Looks like it is adding the current directory and the 'mydir' together, forming a string and searching for the 'mybuild.xml' file.

Please help.

Atiyaman

If the directory is specified in antfile and dir it is appended to the current 
working dir twice. 
It works as expected if the directory is only specified as dir and not 
additionaly in antfile.
creator: nico@apache.org
